We have gone from fat to thin then back to fat again. Every time we put weight on, it erodes our confidence! Have you ever thought there might be another way to approach dieting on a daily basis. Thousands of years ago an interesting group of people held deep knowledge. They were known as Yogis'. They lived, predominately in nature and ate natural foods that were not highly processed like today's food. The Yogis of this time were very advanced in astrology, writing and philosophy. They possessed deep insight of the world and beyond. Among this vast array of knowledge they possessed a comprehensive philosophy on diet and had profound wisdom on how to live naturally. Within the pages of this book is a simple but very effective yogic philosophy of how to eat naturally. This special, uncomplicated yogic diet can help all of us lose weight and have more energy to live life to the full!
